title: Most popular crisps and savoury snack brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
The highest Snack Brand Walkers has 20.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Snack Brand KP nuts.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Snack Brand in the x axis and Share of respondents currently purchasing in the y axis.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
The highest Snack Brand Walkers has 20.0 more Share of respondents currently purchasing than the lowest Snack Brand KP nuts.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents currently purchasing for 7 number of Snack Brands.
The Share of respondents currently purchasing is appeared to be the highest at Snack Brand Walkers and lowest at Snack Brand KP nuts.
Snack Brand Walkers has 1.91 times more Share of respondents currently purchasing than Snack Brand KP nuts which is has the lowest.
Share of respondents currently purchasing at Snack Brand Walkers is 42.0 , second place is Doritos at 32.0, and thirdly is Pringles at 26.0.
Snack Brand Hula Hoops, and Pringles have a similar Share of respondents currently purchasing that is 26.0.
The Snack Brand KP nuts has 1.49 times less Share of respondents currently purchasing than average.
Summing up the values of all Snack Brands, we get total 197.0.
